Message-ID: <86.8e5c5db.27f52557@...>
Date: Thu, 29 Mar 2001 18:55:03 EST
Subject: Destron&Predacon Plans
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type:  text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding:  7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 129
From: Rudra656@...

::Cygnar::
    "What we're going to need is a few fast bots, preferably flyers, to get 
in there and startle them into a fight.  They'll need to get in and hit them 
fast.  It doesn't have to be a hard hitting blow, just enough to startle a 
few and pull them away from the base."

    "We've done some preliminary scans and there are defenses scattered 
outside.  These include stasis mines, armor piercing dart throwers, and laser 
turrets.  The most dangerous of these is the stasis mines because we can't 
afford to lose anyone.  The base itself is presumably shielded but the scans 
were inconclusive."

    "I recommend having the detachment you loan us lure them into a trap of a 
few of your stronger bots.  We'd set and bait the trap ourselves but we're 
somewhat lacking in numbers due to certain, recent events."

    "Once the detachment is on it's way away from the base, our troops will 
move in and pick up the fight.  We shouldn't need any more help if the feint 
is effective."  Cygnar looked among the commanders and grinned sardonically.  
"By now I'm sure you're wondering what's in it for your groups.  We have 
something to prove but you have no such need.  I offer my skills to you at 
any time you need a battle planned.  And, of the bots we are able to disable, 
half will be yours to reprogram and use as you please.  So does my plan meet 
with your approval."
